name: No Distractions Full Screen No menus  Floating answer buttons

config._1: These can be set as desired.
config._2: answer_button_opacity is from 0 (hidden) to 1 (solid). Regardless, mouseover will make answers opaque
config._3: cursor_idle_timer sets how many miliseconds to wait before hiding cursor (negative values mean cursor will not be hidden)
config._4: If settings are subsequently changed through menu buttons, these values will be overwritten and will need to be re-entered
